page.title: 05Traffic Congestion in Sidcup
page.content: Recently opposite the Post Office in Sidcup there was a crash involving a motorcycle.The{man on the motorcycle {was killed.}It is thought that he crashed into the side of a car that was being{driven recklessly. Many accidents are caused by{busy {traffic.}Made even more likely by the number of{parked cars}at the side of roads. Hollies Avenue, a turning off Half-way Street was closed at the begginning of the year because{too {much traffic}was using the road.But since then there have been many accidents in the roads around Hollies Avenue which are much narrower.Many {locals have complained}so it is likely that something will be done about the matter.
